title: "Global South Looks To India's Leadership": Bhutan PM At NDTV World Summit
content: The Global South trusts India's leadership and Prime Minister Narendra Modi can sort out issues between Russia and Ukraine, Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay said at NDTV World Summit today.
summary: The Global South trusts India's leadership and Prime Minister Narendra Modi can sort out issues between Russia and Ukraine, Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay said at NDTV World Summit today.

title: Zepto CEO Shares Story Behind Dropping Out Of Stanford To Build Company
content: Aadit Palicha and Kaivalya Vohra were students at Stanford University, California, studying Computer Sciences when they dropped out of college and chose to build a ten-minute-delivery startup which is now valued at $5 billion
summary: Aadit Palicha and Kaivalya Vohra were students at Stanford University, California, studying Computer Sciences when they dropped out of college and chose to build a ten-minute-delivery startup which is now valued at $5 billion

title: "Aerospace Is Flagbearer Of India's Manufacturing Push": GE South Asia Chief
content: A GE Aerospace manufacturing facility in Pune will soon begin making the F414 jet engine - which powers some of the most advanced fighter planes in the world, including the Boeing F/A 18E/F Super Hornet, GE Aerospace South Asia CEO said.
summary: A GE Aerospace manufacturing facility in Pune will soon begin making the F414 jet engine - which powers some of the most advanced fighter planes in the world, including the Boeing F/A 18E/F Super Hornet, GE Aerospace South Asia CEO said.

title: Freedom Of Ops Against Hezbollah: Israel's Demand For Lebanon Ceasefire
content: A US official told Axios it was highly unlikely that Lebanon and the international community would agree to Israel's conditions.
summary: A US official told Axios it was highly unlikely that Lebanon and the international community would agree to Israel's conditions.

title: South Korea Summons Russia Envoy Over North Korean Troop Deployment
content: About 1,500 North Korean special forces soldiers are already in Russia acclimatising, likely to head to the front lines soon, South Korea's spy agency said Friday.
summary: About 1,500 North Korean special forces soldiers are already in Russia acclimatising, likely to head to the front lines soon, South Korea's spy agency said Friday.

title: 'Aadhaar Gave Indians Existence': Economist Paul Romer On Digital Push
content: Nobel laureate Professor Paul Romer said it is very hard to tell who will win the upcoming US Presidential elections, calling it a "sign of profound distress.
summary: Nobel laureate Professor Paul Romer said it is very hard to tell who will win the upcoming US Presidential elections, calling it a "sign of profound distress.

title: "Some Jobs Reduced Due To AI, But...": Sunil Mittal At NDTV World Summit
content: Addressing the NDTV World Summit 2024, Sunil Bharti Mittal, Founder and Chairperson of Bharti Enterprises, explained how the rapid advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) will impact everything from global economies to geopolitics.
summary: Addressing the NDTV World Summit 2024, Sunil Bharti Mittal, Founder and Chairperson of Bharti Enterprises, explained how the rapid advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) will impact everything from global economies to geopolitics.

title: Prabowo Subianto Takes Oath As Indonesia President, Swears In New Cabinet
content: Prabowo Subianto's cabinet has 48 ministries with over 100 ministers and deputies, including re-appointments of Sri Mulyani Indrawati as finance minister and Bahlil Lahadalia as energy minister.
summary: Prabowo Subianto's cabinet has 48 ministries with over 100 ministers and deputies, including re-appointments of Sri Mulyani Indrawati as finance minister and Bahlil Lahadalia as energy minister.

title: THAAD Anti-Missile System Is "In Place" In Israel, Says US
content: THAAD, or the Terminal High Altitude Area Defense system, is a critical part of the US military's layered air defense systems and adds to Israel's already formidable anti-missile defenses.
summary: THAAD, or the Terminal High Altitude Area Defense system, is a critical part of the US military's layered air defense systems and adds to Israel's already formidable anti-missile defenses.

title: David Cameron Speaks About Rishi Sunak, Recalls A Prediction He Had Made
content: Former Prime Minister of Britain Lord David Cameron today spoke about 'The India Century' at the NDTV World Summit in New Delhi. During his interaction, he mentioned about his prediction of Britain having an India-origin prime minister come true.
summary: Former Prime Minister of Britain Lord David Cameron today spoke about 'The India Century' at the NDTV World Summit in New Delhi. During his interaction, he mentioned about his prediction of Britain having an India-origin prime minister come true.

title: AI Search Startup Perplexity In Talks For $9 Billion Valuation
content: The new valuation, which includes the amount the company would raise, could triple its previous value of $3 billion from a funding round earlier this year.
summary: The new valuation, which includes the amount the company would raise, could triple its previous value of $3 billion from a funding round earlier this year.

title: 'Big Moment': David Cameron On Tata's Takeover Of Jaguar Land Rover
content: Former British prime minister David Cameron hailed Tata Motors' takeover of Jaguar Land Rover, calling it a "big moment".

title: "Something You Don't Forget": David Cameron On PM's Wembley Event In 2015

title: World Excited About India's Growth, Investment: PM Modi At NDTV World Summit
content: PM Modi today spoke about why the 21st Century is 'The India Century' and how the country is growing rapidly and how investors from around the world are excited about India being the fastest growing major economy.
summary: PM Modi today spoke about why the 21st Century is 'The India Century' and how the country is growing rapidly and how investors from around the world are excited about India being the fastest growing major economy.

title: Lok Sabha, Haryana Elections Win A "Message Of Stability": PM Modi
content: Victory in the April-June general election was a "message of stability" and victory in this month's Haryana Assembly election - have reinforced that sentiment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: Victory in the April-June general election was a "message of stability" and victory in this month's Haryana Assembly election - have reinforced that sentiment, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Monday at the NDTV World Summit.

title: "Want Putin In Same Conditions Like My Husband Was": Alexei Navalny's Wife
content: Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, has announced her intention to become the president of Russia after President Vladimir Putin's regime comes to an end.
summary: Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, has announced her intention to become the president of Russia after President Vladimir Putin's regime comes to an end.

title: "India Has Credibility To Mediate In Ukraine War": David Cameron At NDTV World Summit
content: Former UK Prime Minister David Cameron, speaking at the NDTV World Summit today, said that India can play a key role in scaling down the ongoing war between Russia and Ukraine.
summary: Former UK Prime Minister David Cameron, speaking at the NDTV World Summit today, said that India can play a key role in scaling down the ongoing war between Russia and Ukraine.

title: "Permanent Seat On Security Council Should Be India's Right": David Cameron
content: The world needs India's perspective on the challenges it faces and the country should get a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, former UK prime minister David Cameron has said.
summary: The world needs India's perspective on the challenges it faces and the country should get a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, former UK prime minister David Cameron has said.
